summary: This is an email from an individual (sender name redacted) to Linda Singer, Jennifer Freeman, and Kate Brique, copied to Abigail Fu, regarding the sender's intention to publicly testify in an upcoming trial about information they have on 'Adam'. The sender has contacted journalist Kate Brique to do a story and requests confirmation of their testimony status.

persons.name: Linda Singer
persons.context: Addressed in an email regarding the sender's intention to testify about 'Adam' in an upcoming trial.

persons.name: Jennifer Freeman
persons.context: Addressed in an email regarding the sender's intention to testify about 'Adam' in an upcoming trial.

persons.name: Kate Brique
persons.context: A journalist the sender has worked with and contacted to do a story about the sender testifying against 'Adam'. The sender asks her to confirm the testimony with others.

persons.name: Abigail Fu
persons.context: Copied on an email discussing plans to testify and do a media interview about 'Adam'.

persons.name: Adam
persons.context: The individual about whom the email sender possesses information and intends to testify against in an upcoming trial.

connections.description: Kate Brique is preparing to write a story based on the sender's testimony about Adam.
The sender claims to have information on Adam and intends to testify against him in an upcoming trial.
The sender has worked with Kate Brique before and has contacted her to do a story about the sender's testimony.

events.title: Email sent regarding testimony plans
events.description: An individual sends an email to Linda Singer, Jennifer Freeman, and Kate Brique announcing their intention to come forward and testify in an upcoming trial about information on 'Adam'.

events.title: Upcoming trial involving Adam
events.description: An upcoming trial is referenced where the email sender intends to testify against Adam.

events.title: Planned interview with Kate Brique
events.description: The email sender references a planned interview for the following week with journalist Kate Brique regarding their testimony.

keyFacts: An individual is preparing to come forward publicly to testify in an upcoming trial with information they have on a person named Adam.
The individual has contacted journalist Kate Brique to do a story about their testimony, and the story has been approved by Brique's editor.
The email requests that Kate Brique confirm with recipients Jennifer Freeman and Linda Singer that the sender is indeed testifying.
The primary subject of the intended testimony and media story is an individual referred to only as 'Adam'.
